title: The feuds that plagued TV shows
text:
Television shows that were plagued by behind the scenes feuds Corey Sinclair News Corp Australia Television shows that were plagued by behind the scenes feuds Corey Sinclair News Corp Australia Hurt feelings ... Sarah Jessica Parker has admitted the cast of Sex and the City didn’t always get along 
ACTORS on successful television shows are trained to always give the right answers in interviews, and shift the focus away from any drama that might be going on behind the scenes. 
But sometimes the friction between cast members, writers and production staff reachs such a point that rumours begin to leak and the shows become more infamous for backstage bickering than what’s happening on screen. 
Fans of The Good Wife were shocked when it was revealed animosity between Julianna Margulies and the actor who played her bestfriend, Archie Panjabi, had become so bad that producers of the show were forced to use a split screen to film a scene. Cracks ... the cast of Buffy the Vampire Slayer did not always see eye to eye Happier times ... Sarah Michelle Gellar and Alyson Hannigan seemed to stop getting along around season three of Buffy the Vampire Slayer All smiles ... the cast of Beverly Hills 90210 were not always a happy, united team Cast troubles ... Alyssa Milano would often fight with her Charmed co-stars Shannen Doherty and Holly Marie Combs Clashing heads ... comedy legend Chevy Chase often argued with his co-stars and his boss Not so golden ... the cast of The Golden Girls weren’t as close as it seemed on screen Oh no ... the set of Grey’s Anatomy has been filled with drama over the years Attack ... Charlie Sheen lost his job after threatening the show’s creator in the press United front ... Alec Baldwin and Tina Fey often clashed on the set of 30 Rock Stars wrecked ... William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy played bestfriends but weren’t as close off screen Cat fights ... the lead actors of Desperate Housewives were tabloid fodder during the show’s tenure Left out ... The blue power ranger was the focus of homophobic attacks Sex and the catty ... the cast of the beloved HBO series have fought over money in the past Darkest before the dawn ... Moonlighting stars Bruce Willis and Cybill Sheperd argued like cats and dogs Bad blood ... David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson didn’t always get along on the set of The X-Files 1 of n 
The truth is off-screen feuds are nothing new in Hollywood — and sometimes even the most popular shows with the most cohesive casts have some skeletons in the closet.
